title: Rogers PORON Polyurethane Foam
content: SRP converts PORON Polyurethane Foam materials to your custom gasket and seal requirements, and can be supplied with a pressure sensitive adhesive. PORON Polyurethane Foams offer the following benefits:Excellent compression set resistance, which enables durable, long-term performance for gasketing, sealing, and cushioning.Low-outgassing and non-fogging, containing no plasticizers or residual chemicals to contaminate the device. The material will not become brittle and crumble and is non-corrosive to metal.Inherently flame retardant without the use of additives. Many of the materials meet flammability requirements of UL HBF and MVSS 302.Engineered urethane formulations offering a wide modulus range – 2-90 psi @ 25% deflection – for more design versatility requirements.Good chemical resistanceEasy to fabricate, die-cuts cleanly and works with a broad range of adhesivesBroad range of formulas and thicknesses from 0.012″ to 0.500″ (0.43mm to 12.7mm)Why Choose SRP for Custom Rogers PORON Polyurethane products?Since 1951, SRP has served a number of industries. We supply gaskets, heat shields, insulators, isolators, and other related products to electronics, defense, energy, medical, transportation, microelectronics, and other industries. In addition to Rogers PORON® microcellular polyurethanes, we also supply Rogers BISCO silicones. Both materials can be laminated with pressure sensitive adhesive for custom gasketing and sealing options for a wide array of industries. SRP is also a Preferred Converter for Rogers’s materials. Do you have questions about PORON Polyurethane? Feel free to contact us.
description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporations. We fabricate PORON Polyurethane materials into custom gaskets, seals, and pads.

seo.title: Rogers PORON Polyurethane Foam
seo.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporations. We fabricate PORON Polyurethane materials into custom gaskets, seals, and pads.

gaskets.title: PORON 4701-30 Polyurethane
gaskets.content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s PORON polyurethane materials since 1999, including PORON 4701-30.The very soft PORON 4701-30 polyurethane foam is ideal in applications where flexibility is a key requirement. PORON 4701-30 foam material maintains its integrity and effectiveness in gap filling, gasketing and vibration isolation applications.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for PORON materials, and can convert PORON 4701-30 polyurethane into custom gaskets, seals and pads.

gaskets.title: PORON 4701-40 Polyurethane
gaskets.content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s PORON Polyurethane materials since 1999, including PORON 4701-40.When it comes to gasket design, PORON 4701-40 polyurethane is a soft foam that is fit for the job. With a gasket compression percentage range of 5 to 10%, this material is apt for various applications in portable electronics, automotive, aerospace and more.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for PORON materials, and can convert PORON 4701-40 polyurethane into custom gaskets, seals and pads.

gaskets.title: PORON 4701-50 Polyurethane
gaskets.content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s PORON Polyurethane materials since 1999, including PORON 4701-50.PORON 4701-50 materials are firm with excellent compression set resistance, providing shock and impact management. This durable material can maintain its integrity and effectiveness, even when exposed to long periods of fluctuating temperatures. When the focus is on gasket design, PORON 4701-50 foams are a top choice.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for PORON materials, and can convert PORON 4701-50 polyurethane into custom gaskets, seals and pads.

gaskets.title: PORON 4701-60 Polyurethane
gaskets.content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s PORON Polyurethane materials since 1999, including PORON 4701-60.PORON 4701-60 polyurethanes have excellent compression set resistance, ensuring long-term consistency in gap filling, gasketing and sealing applications. The firm nature of PORON 4701-60 foam makes it excellent for use in applications that may be subject to extreme environments, including heat, vibration, dust, dirt and shock.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for PORON materials, and can convert PORON 4701-60 polyurethane into custom gaskets, seals and pads.

gaskets.title: PORON 4790-92 Polyurethane
gaskets.content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s PORON Polyurethane materials since 1999, including PORON 4790-92.PORON 4790-92 polyurethane foam provides excellent protection for lower energy impacts. Softer and with a slow rebound, the material is conformable yet returns to its original shape, allowing for long-term performance.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for PORON materials, and can convert PORON 4790-92 polyurethane into custom gaskets, seals and pads.

gaskets.title: PORON AquaPro Polyurethane
gaskets.content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s PORON polyurethane materials since 1999, including PORON AquaPro.PORON AquaPro Series polyurethanes deliver long term performance.  PORON AquaPro 4701-37 and PORON AquaPro 4701-37 thin foam provide various thicknesses of enhanced water protection. PORON AquaPro 4701-41 foam offers greater closed-cell content for demanding vacuum sealing applications or low closure-force requirements.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for PORON materials, and can convert PORON AquaPro polyurethane into custom gaskets, seals and pads.

gaskets.title: PORON Dura Shape Polyurethane
gaskets.content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s PORON Polyurethane materials since 1999, including PORON Dura Shape.By adding the PORON Dura-Shape option, PORON materials are enforced with a tough polyester film securely bonded between two layers of foam. This option is available to all PORON 4701 foams, as well as the PORON 4790-92 foam. PORON Dura Shape technology increases the polyurethane’s dimensional stability while maintaining the compressibility characteristics of the original material, providing engineers stability for their gasket design needs.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for PORON materials, and can convert PORON Dura Shape polyurethane into custom gaskets, seals and pads.

gaskets.title: PORON EVExtend Battery Pads
gaskets.content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s PORON Polyurethane materials since 1999, including PORON EVExtend Battery Pads.PORON EVExtend battery pad material is the latest advancement in protecting and extending battery life. Designed to address the unique challenges of Electric and Hybrid-Electric Vehicle batteries, PORON EVExtend outperforms other battery pad solutions on the market, offering superior levels of reliability and long-term durability.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for PORON materials, and can convert PORON EVExtend polyurethane into custom gaskets, seals and pads.

gaskets.title: PORON ShockPad Foam
gaskets.content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s PORON Polyurethane materials since 1999, including PORON ShockPad Foam.PORON ShockPad foam provides protection and design flexibility in thin portable electronics and back pad display, including smartphones, tablets and more.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for PORON materials, and can convert PORON ShockPad polyurethane into custom gaskets, seals and pads.

gaskets.title: PORON ShockSeal Polyurethane
gaskets.content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s PORON Polyurethane materials since 1999, including PORON ShockSeal.PORON ShockSeal polyurethanes provide engineers a thick grade material for gasket design, cushions, spacers or springs. PORON ShockSeal materials absorb as much or more energy when compared to higher density materials.Handheld grades of PORON ShockSeal materials reduce impact force by up to four times that of competitive material and conveniently conform to some of the smallest and most intricate handheld device designs.Industrial grades of PORON ShockSeal materials are recognized by UL Gasketing and Sealing (UL50E/UL508) and Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standards 302 (FMVSS 302) specifications.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for PORON materials, and can convert PORON ShockSeal polyurethane into custom gaskets, seals and pads.

gaskets.title: PORON SlimGrip Foam
gaskets.content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s PORON Polyurethane materials since 1999, including PORON SlimGrip Foam.PORON SlimGrip foam is Rogers Corporation’s softest material, able to fill extremely thin design requirements ensuring no gap filling is overlooked. Despite its thin size, PORON SlimGrip foam maintains excellent rebound properties and has no incompressible layers.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for PORON materials, and can convert PORON SlimGrip polyurethane into custom gaskets, seals and pads.

gaskets.title: PORON Soft Seal 4701-15
gaskets.content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s PORON Polyurethane materials since 1999, including PORON Soft Seal 4701-15.PORON 4701-15 soft seal series provides enhanced surface toughness and reliable, durable materials for use in thinner designs. Designed for superior dust sealing at 6lb/ft3, the PORON 4701-15 soft seal series is the lowest density offering in the PORON product line.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for PORON materials, and can convert PORON Soft Seal 4701-15 polyurethane into custom gaskets, seals and pads.

gaskets.title: PORON ThinStik
gaskets.content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s PORON Polyurethane materials since 1999, including PORON ThinStik.In gap filling and sealing design for ultra-thin devices, PORON ThinStik materials are an all-in-one solution, combining high compressible PORON foams with a pressure sensitive adhesive layer built into the construction. This innovation enables higher compressibility than traditional laminated adhesive constructions.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for PORON materials, and can convert PORON ThinStik polyurethane into custom gaskets, seals and pads.

gaskets.title: PORON V-0 Polyurethane
gaskets.content: SRP has been a Preferred Converter for Rogers Corporation’s PORON Polyurethane materials since 1999, including PORON V-0.PORON V-0 foam has been specifically formulated to meet all requirements under UL94 for both V-0 and HBF flammability ratings. Particularly in the HEV market, this material offers advanced sealing capabilities while meeting rigorous specifications with passenger safety in mind.
gaskets.description: SRP is a Preferred Converter for PORON materials, and can convert PORON V-0 polyurethane into custom gaskets, seals and pads.
